title: Down and Dirty
description: Bear shifter Luke Reed is still licking his wounds after a bad breakup. Ally would have made a perfect wife, but their relationship was missing the passion. She was all about the romance, but sometimes a guy just wants to get down and dirty. Now Luke's sex dreams are getting raunchier, and his costar is always a man. The shifter's face is hidden, but when Sam Harper shows up in Sanctuary, there's no mistaking his body. Sparks fly between Sam and Luke and the sex is orgasmic. But Sam doesn't want to be Luke's dirty secret. He wants a commitment. Luke realizes that Sam is the soulmate of his dreams, but he's afraid of disappointing his family. Can Sam convince him to come out of the closet and take a chance on love? [Siren Classic Alternative Paranormal Romance, MM, shape-shifter, HEA]
author: Gale Stanley
